Transformation for times (class hms).

Source: R/trans-date.r
hms_trans.Rd

Transformation for times (class hms).

hms_trans()

Examples

if (require("hms")) {
hms <- round(runif(10) * 86400)
t <- hms_trans()
t$transform(hms)
t$inverse(t$transform(hms))
t$breaks(hms)
}
#> Loading required package: hms
#> 00:00:00
#> 04:00:00
#> 08:00:00
#> 12:00:00
#> 16:00:00
#> 20:00:00
